message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I really think this product is worth more than $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to go down to $122.50, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your need to make a profit, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $118?

I can see you're really trying to make a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $120, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $120, and I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal?
I appreciate the extras, Alice, but I'm still not sure I'm willing to pay $120. Would you be willing to go down to $119?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one last offer. I'll sell it to you for $125, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're at your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $125 and $119, which would be $122. Would you be willing to accept that?
